  • About me

Atipiko Tours is a travel agency that organizes various styles of personalized trips for all types of groups to destinations around the world.

Project goal

The agency hired the design and development services offered by me and my fellow developer for this project. The goal was to design and implement a website through which users could access the information the agency wanted to communicate and make reservations and purchases for trips.

Rol

Product designer

Date

June, 2021

Category

Web design

Timeline

6 weeks

Research and analysis

I used two clients of the company to analyze their mental models and their interaction with the product.

Maria's empathy map

John's empathy map

Maria's journey map

Jhon's journey map

After analyzing the users, I proceed to analyze the market. To do this, I look at the main competitors in the market, evaluating their content, conducting a heuristic analysis, and studying the content and designs they offer, both to gather ideas and to study the additional value proposition.

Competitors

Heuristic evaluation

Content evaluation

Site map

I establish the main structure of the webpage on which it will be designed and developed.

Screen shots

Desktop version

Mobile version

Learnings

  • Assessing ease of navigation on different devices and screen sizes
  • Identifying potential obstacles or friction in the user flow
  • Checking the effectiveness of responsive design in adapting to different devices
  • Collecting feedback from beta users or usability tests to gain insights into the overall experience
